mapper.select: select count(*) from orderinfo where s_id = #{storeID}

select o_code, o_content, m_id, to_char(o_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as o_date, s_id from orderinfo where o_code in ( select o_code from (select rownum as r_num, o_code from (select rownum,o_code from orderinfo where s_id = #{s_id} order by o_code desc)) where r_num >= #{firstNum} and r_num <= #{endNum}) order by o_code desc

select et.ETC_CODE, et.ETC_SPNAME, o.O_CODE, et.ETC_TYPE_CODE, et.ETC_PPATH, et.ETC_PNAME, et.ETC_PSIZE, et.ETC_CONTENT, et.ETC_DATE, o.s_id, o.m_id, o.O_CONTENT, o.o_date from orderinfo o, etc et where o.o_code = et.o_code(+) and o.o_code = #{o_code}
mapper.insert: insert into final_order( fo_code, o_code, cates_code, deli_code, fo_date, fo_sum, fo_num, fo_size, fo_etc ) values( fo_code_sqn .nextval, #{o_code}, #{cates_code}, #{deli_code}, to_date(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{fo_sum}, #{fo_num}, #{fo_size}, #{fo_etc} )
mapper.select: select fo.fo_code, fo.o_code, cs.cates_name, cm.catemm_name, de.deli_type, fo.fo_date, fo.fo_sum, fo.fo_num, fo.fo_size, fo.fo_etc from final_order fo, cate_sub cs, cate_mid cm, deli de where fo.cates_code = cs.cates_code and cs.catemm_code = cm.catemm_code and fo.deli_code = de.deli_code and fo.fo_code in (select max(fo_code) from final_order where o_code= #{o_code})
mapper.update: update final_order set deli_code = #{deli_code}, fo_date = sysdate, fo_sum = #{fo_sum}, fo_num = #{fo_num}, fo_size = #{fo_size}, fo_etc = #{fo_etc} where fo_code = #{fo_code}
